text: Orienting reflex: the tendency of an organism to orient its sense toward unexpected stimuli Habituation: The tendency of an organism to ignore repeated stimuli Dishabituation: re-responding to a stimulus to which one had been habituated Yy, Y M | i Â£ Vro, Vo, Crows present in corn field Introduction of scarecrow Prolonged exposure to scarecrow
